reviewText: We take our 2 year old and 7 year old to My Gym. So, when we found out that there was a DVD we bought it. We were't sure what to expect since the DVD can't really provide the slides, ball pit, gymnastics equipment, and all that other stuff, but our youngest loves it. I highly recommend it to anyone with kids. It's fun and not terribly long.

Wish I had known this is for small babies only.  Have an 18-month-old who is totally bored with it.  The high-pitched voice and fast movements are hard to follow. May be some exercise for a mommy, but does nothing for a child over 12 months.
MY SON LOVES IT HE ENJOYS  EVERY MIN OF THE SHOW. HE ALWAYS WANTS ME TO REPEAT IT. OBER AND OVER
my niece really loves the baby first tv videos!! I love to watch her trying to do the gym-excersies by herself, she laughs and laughs with them

We bought this couple of videos after seeing the Baby 1st tv channel. We love it! My baby learn new songs and it is a great way to introduce them to do gymn and so the parents. Also is great to have a guide and be able to do gym at any time.
